Key Match Events: Jalen Brunson led all scorers with 10 points in the final frame, helping convert a close game to a comfortable win.
OG Anunoby had seven dunks in the game, showcasing his impact on the Knicks' offense.
OG Anunoby contested more 3-pointers (10) than the entire Sixers team (8) and 17 shots overall, nearly triple as many as the next-highest player for either team contested, Jericho Sims.
The Knicks held the Sixers under 100 points on 37% from the field and 33% from deep.
Post-Match Reflections: Joel Embiid was clearly rusty and not in game shape after missing the entire preseason and opening weeks of the season.
Embiid expressed a desire to play against the undefeated Cavs despite previous statements about not playing back-to-backs.
